Literature.Title: Pseudomycins, a family of novel peptides from Pseudomonas syringae possessing broad-spectrum antifungal activity
Literature.Author: Harrison L, Teplow DB, Rinaldi M, Strobel G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=12.5-25µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Curvularia spicifera(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
